location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to Henry Willock, HM Charg√© d'affaires at Tehran

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of dispatches for India from Mr Willock, dated 21 and 26 September 1824. It notes that their conveyance was delayed as the cossid, Hussun Ali, was taken ill at Shiraz.
